entry.title: You know all of me
entry.summary:
Author: OwlsandRoses

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,948Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Merlin, is silently dying. The love of his life is married to one of his best friends. There’s nothing he can do; they both seem genuinely happy. He just has to be on the sidelines, always just watching. The only one who knows the true Merlin, magic, true heart and all is Lancelot.

entry.title: Professor Emrys
entry.summary:
Author: Sophthenerd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,401Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 286

Summary: What if Merlin was best friends with the Marauders but left for an internship just after school ended. What happens when he returns years later and learns what happened to his friends while he was gone.This is my first fic so it might be a little choppy. For some context all 5 seasons of Merlin are canon in this and this takes place while Merlin is waiting for Arthur to rise from the lake of Avalon. Books one and two of Harry Potter are the same and the story starts off just before book three.

entry.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Time
entry.summary:
Author: HarmonyOfTheSpheres

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,629Chapters: 4/21Kudos: 119

Summary: Merlin has returned to Hogwarts for his second year as the History of Magic professor, and this time he is determined to find a way to destroy the horcrux within Harry before it's too late. It's not exactly a simple task, however, especially with an escaped convict on the loose and dementors lurking around Hogwarts' grounds. So when Merlin finally gets a chance to change Harry's fate, he takes it.A bit of time travel is surely worth the risk if it will save Harry's life—isn't it?

entry.title: Destiny Unfold
entry.summary:
Author: chronic_pain_in_the_ass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,711Chapters: 2/65Kudos: 15

Summary: No young man, no matter how great, or mystic can know his destiny. He cannot glimpse his part in the great story that is about to unfold. Like everyone, he must live and learn. And so, it will be for the young magic arriving at the gates of Camelot. A boy that will, in time, father the legend. His name: Merlin.OrA rewrite of Merlin if the writers weren’t cowards. A lot gayer, magic users aren’t the enemy in every single episode, and Uther is the actual villain of the story. Morgana is still a villain, but we have sympathy for her.

entry.title: All I ever wanted was to be enough for you
entry.summary:
Author: jungvaa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,120Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Arthur always knew that it would be over.The funny feelings. Stolen kisses in the throne room. Hungry looks at each other. He knew that they were too good to last, good things wouldn’t happen to him. But he was lost in an illusion where he felt loved. He didn’t want to leave that illusion; he only wanted to feel the kisses, the caring touches for a bit longer.That was what he thought when he caught Merlin using magic. No, no. That would be a lie. The first thing he thought was that Merlin was so beautiful with these golden eyes. How beautiful and cruel.“I would never hurt you. I never hurt you.”His voice was shaky, full of emotions. Was there love in that voice, Arthur thought, or was that another lie? A fic where magic reveal goes wrong in the worst way.

entry.title: Day after day
entry.summary:
Author: MyEpicPseudonym

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,604Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 13

Summary: “What’s up with you?” Arthur asked as he watched Merlin pour water into a goblet. Despite his quick and clumsy movements, he didn’t spill a drop. “Have you got somewhere to be?”Merlin chuckled humourlessly. “Just tomorrow would be great.” What starts out as an ordinary day for Arthur, quickly turns out not to be so ordinary after all.Especially for Merlin, who is going through something. Arthur tries to figure out what's wrong with him, so he can fix it.

entry.title: To be with you in paradise
entry.summary:
Author: Sherlock_Spock

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,308Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 34

Summary: A merciless heatwave descends on Camelot, draining knights and servants alike, testing even Prince Arthur’s resolve. In the suffocating air, where every movement grows heavier and every glance lingers too long, the line between duty and desire begins to blur.Caught between the weight of the sun and the pull of something far more dangerous, Arthur and Merlin soon find that the fiercest heat may not come from the summer at all.

entry.title: Love You Like You Should Be Loved
entry.summary:
Author: tansyuduri

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,167Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 8

Summary: Born with many inherited health issues, Merlin Emrys had dedicated much of his life to environmentalism and vigilante hacking. He is hired as a token environmental adviser for Albion Enterprises LTD in the aftermath of a tell-all book published by the CEO’s daughter. There, he meets Arthur, the CEO’s son, and is swept up into a whirlwind friendship and blossoming romance. It’s something he never intended — especially since he plans to hack the company from the inside. And, most especially, because Merlin is determined to be single for his entire life. But, he is drawn to Arthur, and Arthur is drawn to Merlin. They fit together. It's almost like they are two sides of the same coin. With so many things separating them and yet so many things drawing them together, Arthur and Merlin's destiny remains uncertain. Even as, once again, the future of Albion (Enterprises) rests on both their shoulders.This fic is dedicated to those of us in the Merlin fandom who deal with serious chronic illnesses, whether mental or physical.

Summary: I had so much fun writing August and Betty last summer that I am back with more Taylor Swift inspired prompts (Cardigan and Willow this time, I felt bad that Cardigan was left out last August).I'm hoping to have even more fun and explore even more fandoms this time around! :)

entry.title: A God's Cage is Meant to be Broken
